title: DimensionResult
description: Test case result for a specific combination of dimension values

dimensionValues.description: Array of dimension name-value pairs for this result (e.g., [{'name': 'region', 'value': 'mumbai'}, {'name': 'product', 'value': 'laptop'}])

testCaseStatus.description: Status of the test for this dimension combination

result.description: Details of test case results for this dimension combination

passedRows.description: Number of rows that passed for this dimension

failedRows.description: Number of rows that failed for this dimension

passedRowsPercentage.description: Percentage of rows that passed for this dimension

failedRowsPercentage.description: Percentage of rows that failed for this dimension

impactScore.description: Impact score indicating the significance of this dimension for revealing data quality variations. Higher scores indicate dimensions with more variance in test results.
